subtitles.transcript: The legislature has put the – and the governor – has put the university
at the edge of a precipice
and I think that’s a tragedy.
And I think that it will be very sad if this generation of politicians
goes down as the people who ruined the University of California,
literally the best public university system in the world,
arguably one of the best institutions in the world.
I mean there’s just not many entities better than the University of California
with their failure to support the university.
And I don’t – I mean I don’t think it’s fair to blame the administrators here
because they’re just trying to find a way to save the university
in the throws of the craziness of a political system
that doesn’t seem to think that investing in young people
